mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_list (icategory, iuser, title, ctnt) VALUES (${icategory}, ${iuser}, #{title}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, B.nm AS writerNm FROM t_board_list A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.icategory = ${icategory} ORDER BY iboard DESC LIMIT ${page}, ${amount}
SELECT A.iboard, A.icategory, A.title, A.ctnt, A.iuser, A.rdt , B.nm AS writerNm FROM t_board_list A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE iboard = ${iboard}

SELECT A.*, B.nm AS writerNm FROM t_board_list A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser
WHERE A.title LIKE '%${searchText}%'
WHERE A.ctnt LIKE '%${searchText}%'
WHERE B.nm LIKE '%${searchText}%'
AND icategory = ${icategory} ORDER BY iboard DESC LIMIT ${page}, ${amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_board_list A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser
WHERE A.title LIKE '%${searchText}%'
WHERE A.ctnt LIKE '%${searchText}%'
WHERE B.nm LIKE '%${searchText}%'
AND icategory = ${icategory}
SELECT A.iboard, A.ireview, B.nm AS writerNm FROM t_user_review A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser

SELECT A.tall, A.weight, A.rating, A.ctnt, A.gender, B.uid, C.img_url_big, C.title, D.color, D.sm, D.md, D.lg, D.xl FROM t_user_review A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN product_list C ON A.iboard = C.iboard INNER JOIN purchased D ON A.iboard = D.iboard WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard} LIMIT 10
